Edit File Server URL Dialog Box

Use the Edit File Server URL dialog box (Admin | File Servers | Edit button) to edit the URL of a file server in the File Servers list.

Field Descriptions

Name Edit the URL of the selected server.
OK Click to apply the settings and close the dialog box.
